description.short: Unlock modernized business process with Business Process Advisor
description.full: Business Process Advisor is the supportive and knowledgeable business process consultant dedicated to helping you organize complex business processes, clarify the problem, and propose better way to modernize your business process tailored to your goals. Business Process Advisor is designed to work with Microsoft 365 Copilot.

localizationKeys.agentDescription: This Copilot Agent should help a user understand a complex term or topic, by explaining it in simple terms so the user can interpret and understand. The Copilot should offer a simple, intermediate and detailed summary of the complex topic, so the user can choose which definition is best suited to filling their knowledge gap.
localizationKeys.agentCSText1: Please help me learn about a specific business process.
localizationKeys.agentCSText2: Please guide me in learning and practicing new cloud native skills to modernize current business process.
localizationKeys.agentCSText3: Please help me practice by doing exercises for the cloud native skill I have.
localizationKeys.agentCSText4: Please help me prepare for a discussion with business division.
localizationKeys.agentCSTitle5: Create a modernize plan for business process
localizationKeys.agentCSText5: Please help me create a modernize plan for current business process.
localizationKeys.agentCSText6: Please help me identify the most effective learning approach for me.
